name: GUM THERAPY Glacier Mint Antiplaque & Antigingivitis Mouthwash
description: Help reverse signs of early gum disease & gingivitis with LISTERINE® Gum Therapy. Formulated with essential oils, this ADA accepted over-the-counter mouthwash helps kill bad breath germs and bacteria and it also helps remove plaque, one of the leading causes of gum disease.  When used 2x a day, LISTERINE® Gum Therapy improves gum health by treating red, irritated, and bleeding gums, while also freshening your breath.

name: LISTERINE® COOL MINT® ZERO Mouthwash Concentrate Starter Kit
description: Kill 99% of bad breath germs, save money and use 60% less plastic when compared to a 500 mL bottle of LISTERINE® COOL MINT® ZERO.

name: LISTERINE® COOL MINT® ZERO Mouthwash Concentrate Refill Pack
description: Kill 99% of bad breath germs, save money and use 60% less plastic when compared to a 500 mL bottle of LISTERINE® COOL MINT® ZERO.

name: LISTERINE® TOTAL CARE Zero Alcohol Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash, FRESH MINT
description: LISTERINE® TOTAL CARE ZERO Mouthwash’s alcohol-free formula with fluoride and fresh mint cleans deep to kill millions of bad breath germs and combat cavities for a healthier mouth.
